navigation_items.title: Find your reason
navigation_items.description: One of the best motivations for quitting is having a clear reason in mind so you know exactly why you’re doing it in the first place.

navigation_items.title: Quit stories
navigation_items.description: Be encouraged and motivated by listening to stories of others who've quit smoking for life.

navigation_items.title: Vaping (e-cigarettes)
navigation_items.description: Vaping products are also known as e-cigarettes, e-cigars, vape pens or personal vapourisers. Vapes are harmful. The safest option is to not vape at all.

navigation_items.title: Choose your method
navigation_items.description: There are plenty of ways to quit smoking cigarettes and vapes. Find one that suits you best and commit to it.

navigation_items.title: Pregnancy and smoking
navigation_items.description: Whether you’re thinking about getting pregnant, you're pregnant or have recently given birth, quitting smoking or vaping is the best thing you can do for the health of  you and your baby.

navigation_items.title: Sign up for our support program
navigation_items.description: Sign up for My Quit Journey to support you to stop smoking.

navigation_items.title: Plan your journey
navigation_items.description: Congratulations on taking the first step in your journey and deciding to make one of the best choices of your life.
